channel.title: GMLScape - (GML runescape CLASSIC remake) UPDATE 2
channel.description:
[b]MAKE SURE TO PRESS F1 TO LEARN THE CONTROLS[/b]
Well I have decided to start making a RS remake using GML. Note that the graphics will not be the same but the gameplay, quests ect... will be. I am in the library atm (only way i can get internet) so I cannot keep you updated all the time, but I will be posting updates daily. I will also be showing the code and will be releasing the source so that others may use it as a guide to create games using it. Because it is Game Maker I will be having to use .dll's in order for others to connect so proly only allow about 6-7 people will be able to login at a time without the use of a proper VPS server.
Walking/Running Logging In/Loading/Out(forgot to add a logout button lol just press Esc to end the game) Click Quests Eating Skills Music
I will be starting this project right now! So I guss I am going to head home and start working! See you tomorrow everybody!
March 18, 2011 Update 1 Game Test: http://up.ht/f0Enfg
Update 1 Includes : Logging in and the beginning of the point and click movement. I started working on the variables and proper physics for this and will done with it soon. I forgot to bring the source on my usb, but you can see the logging in and creating a new user works from the download above. I will bring the updated source code monday.
[b]March 21, 2011 Update 2 Game Test[/b]:
Ok well I have decided to first make a rsc remake. update 2 now has walking, some npc's, using spells, gaining exp, some skills such as fishing, woodcutting, attack, strength, defence, magic, ect..., going up and down stairs, ingame chat, and more! check it out!
GAME TEST DOWNLOAD: http://up.ht/e3PVQy
SOURCE DOWNLOAD: http://up.ht/gSH6Uk

item.title: GMLScape - (GML runescape CLASSIC remake) UPDATE 2
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

GML Programmer, could you possibly help me with a problem?
I have added code in the obj_tree function that checks if the player is in a certain distance to it, and if not, walks them to it (by setting an obj_pointer and stealing the walking code) but if I click on an obj_tree that is far away, it sets a waypoint to the nearest obj_tree. How can I fix this?

Read full topic

item.title: GMLScape - (GML runescape CLASSIC remake) UPDATE 2
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

No by all means go ahead. Remember this is just the beginning stages and I haven’t really had much time to work on the project. This whole week I am free though and I intend on greatly updating this in many ways. It will be 3D and have the rotating camera with some proper sprites, and i am gonna make the whole name in chatbox thing work. Also it is going to have much nicer interface.

Read full topic

item.title: GMLScape - (GML runescape CLASSIC remake) UPDATE 2
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Testing this, watch this space.

EDIT: Tested, what is this?!
I see no evidence of anything, the chat doesn’t use the name I log in with, I see no way to attack NPCs, you don’t gain exp but the level is decided upon how many logs you collect, no attack, no strength, no defence, there are buttons that do nothing, in short [size=24pt]you’re doing it wrong[/size].

Read full topic

item.title: GMLScape - (GML runescape CLASSIC remake) UPDATE 2
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:27, topic:386731”][quote author=r0ckstar96 link=topic=482500.msg3534690#msg3534690 date=1300484286]

Yeah cuz you tried clicking to move. I havent finished that part yet, I wasnt able to mess around with it that much yesterday I was really busy. So far you cant do much but create a user and load a user. Today I will be doing much more though

Huh… you know at first I thought this was bullshit because you were using GML but then I saw that there’s a difference between GML and Game Maker and now I’m kind of eager to see how this turns out.

EDIT: Have you considered making a Runescape Classic remake?
[/quote]

it seems u know less about programming than a delta user[/quote]

Eh… Probably.

Read full topic

Not meaning to start a war, just giving tips for when you decide to update, have at least moderate things working.

item.title: GMLScape - (GML runescape CLASSIC remake) UPDATE 2
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

Epic Steve:

I don’t know anything about GML - but can’t you rip all the graphics from the RS cache and use them in GML?

Not sure how to rip a cache. Would love if you could help

Chassy13:

I’ve downloaded Game Maker to see how bad it really is. Like everyone said, it is completely drag and drop and takes no intelligence whatsoever. Sure it is fun to mess around with, but nothing you make with it is/ever will be respected. Learn a real language and make the same exact thing.

You need the pro edition for actually using code since it gives you complete control over your games you can get it here: http://up.ht/gHKAsN

jmood128:

It must be shitty since it can only hold 6-7 players with out a VPS… I was doing 50 players on an allstar server on a single core processor with 1gb of RAM…

No it could hold more but I’m not gonna release the source code that will do that for you. I’m only gonna allow on 6-7 people.

Read full topic

item.title: GMLScape - (GML runescape CLASSIC remake) UPDATE 2
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=482500.msg3533918#msg3533918 date=1300407913]
What the hell is GML? Is it another Pokemon-style RPG type game maker?
[/quote]Worse.[/quote]

Well theres the Geography Markup Language

The Geography Markup Language (GML) is the XML grammar defined by the Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC)

And then the Game Maker Language. I stopped reading at:

Game Maker Language (GML) is a scripting language developed for use with a computer game creation application

Read full topic
